objects.description: [DualToy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/MOB-S0031) "side loads malicious or risky apps to both Android and iOS devices via a USB connection" and also collects the "connected iOS device’s information including IMEI, IMSI, ICCID, serial number and phone number".

external_references.description: [ Claud Xiao. (2016, September 13). DualToy: New Windows Trojan Sideloads Risky Apps to Android and iOS Devices. Retrieved January 24, 2017.
